message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe will significantly enhance your operations and contribute to your success. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $800,000 to you. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to provide you with substantial savings while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further or if there's any way we can make this arrangement more appealing to you.
